sub_concepts.name: Biome
sub_concepts.definition: A large geographical area of distinctive plant and animal groups, which are adapted to that particular environment.

sub_concepts.name: Food Chain
sub_concepts.definition: A series of organisms each dependent on the next as a source of food.

sub_concepts.name: Habitat
sub_concepts.definition: The natural home or environment of an organism.

sub_concepts.name: Biodiversity
sub_concepts.definition: The variety of life forms present in different habitats and ecosystems.
